section.title: Viewing User Information
section.para: You can view detailed information about each user in the Users tab.

step.para: Click the Users tab to display the list of authorized users.
Select the user, or perform a search if the user is not visible on the results list.
The details pane displays for the selected user, usually with the General tab displaying general information, such as the domain name, email and status of the user.
The other tabs allow you to view groups, permissions, quotas, and events for the user.
For example, to view the groups to which the user belongs, click the Directory Groups tab.
